channel.title: PokerDiagram Poker Podcast
channel.description: On-line tournament poker podcasting from Pokerdiagram.com
channel.itunes:author: Pokerdiagram.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Poker podcasting from Pokerdiagram.com (MP3)
channel.itunes:summary: On-line tournament poker chat and action with your sexy hosts Henry Phillips and Zog. Recorded high above the streets of London, the Pokerdiagram podcast brings you 'as live' poker action from real-money on-line tournaments, plus advice from non-experts and a little light banter. MP3 version - use other feed for enhanced podcasts.

item.title: PD058 - Back Again, The Return, Part Deux
item.description: After slacking for a while the Pokerdiagram boys are back online... playing more poker and still yakikng away about it.
item.itunes:summary: After slacking for a while the Pokerdiagram boys are back online... playing more poker and still yakikng away about it.

item.title: PD057 - Listener Tournament!
item.description: More as-live online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog, podcasting from the heart of London.
item.itunes:summary: At last! The first Listener Tournament of 2007... 40 players line up for our first listener event at Full Tilt Poker.

item.title: Listener Tournament announcement
item.description: The title says it all. Except for the info that's in the announcement itself. And the name of the tourney, which is "PD Listener Tournament".

item.title: PD056 - The One Where Zog And Henry Go Back To Hollywood Poker
item.description: More as-live online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog, podcasting from the heart of London.
item.itunes:summary: The Pokerdiagram boys head over to HollywoodPoker for a game this week. Plus chat about what's wrong with Zog's cash Omaha hi-lo game, and news of Henry's late-night tournament strategy.

item.title: PD055 - Note-takers part 2
item.description: More as-live online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog, podcasting from the heart of London.
item.itunes:summary: Continuing the tournament from show 54, we're down to two tables and it's time to see how far Zog can make it. More online poker talk and action with Henry and Zog - with news of the next listener tournament!

item.title: PD054 - Beware of the note-takers
item.description: More as-live online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog, podcasting from the heart of London.
item.itunes:summary: Before getting down to any more poker action Henry and Zog have to deal with the Pokerdiagram mailbag - and there's something very scary lurking in there.

item.title: PD053 - Part two of the Easter special!
item.description: More as-live online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog, podcasting from the heart of London.
item.itunes:summary:
Pokerdiagram, the world's longest-running poker podcast, is the show where we like to play online poker - and talk about it while we're on the job.
More online poker action from your favourite London poker boys, bringing this particular tournament to its exciting conclusion

item.title: PD052 - Easter special!
item.description: More as-live online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog, podcasting from the heart of London.
item.itunes:summary:
Pokerdiagram, the world's longest-running poker podcast, is the show where we like to play online poker - and talk about it while we're on the job.
In the run-up to Easter, Henry and Zog take a break from their hectic chocolate-buying schedules to indulge in a little on-line tournament poker action. And with Henry back from holiday and Zog reeling from a tough time on Full Tilt, the Pokerdiagram boys have plenty to chat about along the way.

item.title: PD051 - An evening at Pokerstars
item.description: More as-live online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog, podcasting from the heart of London.
item.itunes:author: PokerDiagram.com
item.itunes:summary: For their next stop on the Pokerdiagram "Cardrooms At Which Our Listeners Can Actually Play" Virtual World 2007, Henry and Zog head for Pokerstars for more real money on-line poker tournament action and chat. Will Zog make the money? Will Henry like the graphics? Have all the non-fruit flavoured Jelly Bellies (apart from Strawberry Daquiri, Strawberry Cheesecake, and Pina Colada) been removed as specified in the technical rider? Turn your iPod up to 11 and hit play to find out....

item.title: PD050 - Full Tilt Ahead, Mr Sulu
item.description: More as-live online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog, podcasting from the heart of London.
item.itunes:author: PokerDiagram.com
item.itunes:summary: A change of scenery this time, as Henry and Zog check in at Full Tilt Poker for more online tournament action and chat.

item.title: PD049 - All I want for Xmas is awesome cards all the time
item.description: More as-live online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog, podcasting from the heart of London.
item.itunes:summary: Holiday season, and the halls are decked with boughs of Holly. As Madonna, Doyle Brunson and Will Smith all cancelled at the last minute, this seasonal PokerDiagram special features Zog and Henry playing online poker and talking. And maybe drinking a little.

item.title: PD048 - Rakefinger Casinos Are Forever!
item.description: More as-live online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog, podcasting from the heart of London.
item.itunes:author: www.pokerdiagram.com
item.itunes:summary: Henry and Zog are very excited - as if the online poker action isn't enough, there's a new poker-themed Bond film to talk about! Verily, the PokerDiagram cup runneth over. Technical gremlins mean that audio quality for this show is well below par - apologies folks.

item.title: PD047 - Hey, where's our home game?
item.description: More as-live online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog, podcasting from the heart of London.
item.itunes:author: www.pokerdiagram.com
item.itunes:summary: If it's Friday night, and PokerDiagram boys Henry and Zog are in town, then there's hold 'em action - but every now and again their friends turn out to be hopeless bastards who can't even manage to turn up to a simple game of poker. Which is why this episode of PokerDiagram comes from Stevie and Emma's kitchen... guest commentators a go-go!

item.title: PD046 - The Fourth Listener Tournament
item.description: More online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog.
item.itunes:summary: In a time when the future of online poker is looking uncertain, it's good to know that there are some familiar things to hold onto... such as the PokerDiagram listener tournament! 40 listeners signed up to challenge Zog this time around, and we stay with the action until the final hand.

item.title: PD045 - Henry plays in the last chance saloon
item.description: More online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog.
item.itunes:summary: More as-live online poker talk and action from the London poker podcast duo. For show 45 the boys swap seats, and Henry has the last of his bankroll on the line. Plus news of the next listener tournament, and backing music from listener Jody Whitesides (www.jodywhitesides.com).

item.title: PD044 - Power Poker a la No-Shuffle
item.description: More online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog... with special guest Jon 'No-Shuffle' Murphy
item.itunes:summary: This week Zog steps aside to let Jon 'No-Shuffle' Murphy show the regular PokerDiagram team how this whole online poker thing should REALLY be done. Oh, and there's no confirmed date for the next listener tournament yet, but it should be in 3-4 weeks time.

item.title: PD043 - The boys are back in town
item.description: More online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog...
item.itunes:author: www.pokerdiagram.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Returning after a short hiatus, Henry and Zog get down to more online poker action and chat. There's real money tournament action at PokerRoom, listener email, and a whole load of pathetic whingeing about some bad beat or other... we're back!
item.itunes:summary: Returning after a short hiatus, Henry and Zog get down to more online poker action and chat. There's real money tournament action at PokerRoom, listener email, and a whole load of pathetic whingeing about some bad beat or other... we're back!

item.title: PD042 - Cheers! And goodbye for now.
item.description: More online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog... this week the booze does all the talking.
item.itunes:author: www.pokerdiagram.com
item.itunes:subtitle: More online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog... this week the booze does all the talking.
item.itunes:summary: Henry and Zog drop in on Keith-Y-Guy in order to demonstrate the effects of a little booze on a finely-tuned poker machine. And on Zog's game also. Possibly our last podcast for a little while due to unexpected personal bullshit... watch this space. [Re-posted due to RSS feed error.]

item.title: PD041 - Bigger, Longer, Hardly Cut At All
item.description: More online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog... a marathon multi-table session this time.
item.itunes:subtitle: More online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog... a marathon multi-table session this time.
item.itunes:summary: It's a bit of a marathon this week, but there's just so much hot sock-cooking action in this one that we couldn't cut it down any more. We mentioned a link to some hand details, BTW - we didn't post it because it turned out that you could only view details if you were in the hand. Ryan: send us a transcript/record of the hand and we'll post it.

item.title: PD040 - Draw Poker in the WSOPDL
item.description: More online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog... No-Shuffle joins in the fun this time, and there's draw poker action at Luca's WSOPDL.
item.itunes:subtitle: More online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog... No-Shuffle joins in the fun this time, and there's draw poker action at Luca's WSOPDL.
item.itunes:summary: Jon "No-Shuffle" Murphy joins Zog and Henry this week with Vegas tales, and some slightly-less-clueless-than-Zog draw poker advice. No enhanced version this time - sorry folks!

item.title: PD039 - Hooray for Hollywood
item.description: More online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog at PokerDiagram. Henry's back after a week in Vegas, and Zog sits down at Hollywoodpoker.com as the PokerDiagram bus makes another stop on the Impromptu Poker Tour.
item.itunes:author: PokerDiagram.com
item.itunes:subtitle: More online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog at PokerDiagram. Henry's back after a week in Vegas, and Zog sits down at Hollywoodpoker.com as the PokerDiagram bus makes another stop on the Impromptu Poker Tour.
item.itunes:summary: More online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog at PokerDiagram. Henry's back after a week in Vegas, and Zog sits down at Hollywoodpoker.com as the PokerDiagram bus makes another stop on the Impromptu Poker Tour.

item.title: PD038 - PokerDiagram at Full Tilt
item.description: More 'as live' poker action and talk from the PokerDiagram boys. Taking a break from their usual venue, this time Zog's playing at Full Tilt Poker while Henry provides the commentary.
item.itunes:author: http://www.pokerdiagram.com/
item.itunes:subtitle: More 'as live' poker action and talk from the PokerDiagram boys. Taking a break from their usual venue, this time Zog's playing a sit'n'go tournament at Full Tilt Poker while Henry provides the commentary.
item.itunes:summary: Taking a break from their usual venue, this time Zog's playing a sit'n'go tournament at Full Tilt Poker while Henry provides the commentary. Plus listener email, and follow-up to our look at security and player collusion.

item.title: PD037 - Yes, we have No-Shuffle today
item.description: More 'as live' poker action and talk from the PokerDiagram boys. Jonny 'No-Shuffle' Murphy joins Henry and Zog to give a little extra advice, and there's a look at the problem of collusion in on-line poker.
item.itunes:author: Pokerdiagram.com
item.itunes:subtitle: This week, Jonny 'No-Shuffle' Murphy joins the regular team of Henry and Zog. In this show there's a look at the problem of collusion in on-line poker, and a $30 sit'n'go for Zog.
item.itunes:summary: This week, Jonny 'No-Shuffle' Murphy joins the regular team to provide a fresh perspective on Zog's game while Henry describes the action. In this show there's a look at the problem of collusion in on-line poker, and the game is a $30 sit'n'go tournament.

item.title: PD036 - World Series action!
item.description: More 'as live' poker action and talk from the PokerDiagram boys. This time out, Henry takes on a few familiar names in the first of the WSOPDL events created by listener Luca, while Zog takes his turn in the commentary seat.
item.itunes:author: Pokerdiagram.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Zog and Henry swap places this week, so it's Henry who gets to play in the first of the WSOPDL events while Zog provides the commentary.
item.itunes:summary: Thanks to listener Luca, PokerDiagram listeners have their own World Series events to play in over the coming weeks and months - and as Zog and Henry have swapped places this week, it's Henry who takes on a few familiar names in the first of the WSOPDL events while Zog provides the commentary.

item.title: Not the next PD show...
item.description: A quick word from Henry and Zog about forthcoming action!
item.itunes:author: www.pokerdiagram.com
item.itunes:subtitle: News of a tournament created by one of PokerDiagram's listeners, and how you can take part.
item.itunes:summary: Not a full show this time, but a quick word from the PokerDiagram boys about a tournament set up by one of the listeners.

item.title: PD035 - New tactics
item.description: A little more conversation, and a little more online poker action from the PokerDiagram boys.
item.itunes:author: Pokerdiagram.com
item.itunes:subtitle: This week, Henry and Zog are road testing a slightly different strategy...
item.itunes:summary: This week Zog's road-testing a slightly different strategy... listen in to see how it works out! Apologies for the slightly echoey sound on this one - our new location really needs some carpets.

item.title: PD034 - The 4th Listener Tournament!
item.description: Zog takes on the finest poker players in the world - can he beat the listeners?
item.itunes:author: Pokerdiagram.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Listeners to the podcast queue up to take on the Zogmeister.
item.itunes:summary:
Listeners to the podcast queue up to take on the Zogmeister.
Sorry for the lack of an enhanced version this week, blame Zog's skiing trip and the fact that Henry is an idiot.

item.title: PD033 - Loose vs. tight, and a word from The Doctor
item.description: More online hold 'em tournament action with Henry and Zog - more multi-table action this week, and Henry has something to say about Zog's game.
item.itunes:author: Pokerdiagram.com
item.itunes:subtitle: More online hold 'em tournament action with Henry and Zog - more multi-table action this week, and Henry has something to say about Zog's game.
item.itunes:summary:
Online hold 'em tournament action with Henry and Zog - more multi-table action this week, and Henry has something to say about Zog's game.
And, yes, we did screw up over the date of a certain listener tournament - it's a long story involving Mrs. PokerDiagram's social calendar, and Henry and Zog's general ineptitude. So if you're still confused after listening to the intro: it's on March 12th.

item.title: PD032 - Three-table tournament
item.description: Online poker action and talk with Henry and Zog. This time the action is a 3-table tournament, and there's more of the usual insight, explanation, excuses, whingeing and banter as the boys pick over the game.
item.author: pokerdiagram@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Pokerdiagram.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Online poker action and talk with Henry and Zog. This week: a 3-table hold'em tourney.
item.itunes:summary: This time the action is a 3-table tournament, and there's more of the usual insight, explanation, excuses, whingeing and banter as the boys pick over the game.

item.title: PD031 - Omaha/8 revisited, and fun with animals
item.description: More online poker action with the Henry and Zog of online poker: Zog and Henry. This week the boys return to the scene of previous humiliation and get involved in an Omaha/8 tournament - it' also time to announce the Mac Poker Pro 'Poker Animal' competition winners, and there's news of the next listener tournament.

item.title: PD030 - $20 multi-table action
item.description: Another life-enhancing slice of pure, organic poker wisdom from the zen masters of online hold 'em tournament action: Henry and Zog. 100% natural. No preservatives or artificial stimulants were used in the making of this show.

item.title: PD029 - Small stakes, big field
item.description: Online poker action and chat with Henry and Zog - this week it's a low-stakes qualifying tournament, plus a quick look at PokerDiagram listeners around the world!

item.title: PD028 - Zogster back behind the wheel
item.description: More online poker action and chat with Henry and Zog - this week it's Zog's first chance to play on mic in 2006, there's a chance to win poker tracking software, and more email from listeners - including yet another Hammer theory.
item.author: pokerdiagram@gmail.com

item.title: PD027 - Henry in the hot seat
item.description: More online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog, back after a rather extended New Year break. This time it's Henry's turn to play, while Zog has to be content with dishing out advice and commentary. Listen in for news of a special offer for our listeners... and to find out whether H can maintain Z's consistently mediocre record at the Hold 'Em tables!
item.author: pokerdiagram@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Pokerdiagram.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Role reversal at the $10 tables

item.title: PD026 - Tripping Out
item.description: Another slice of online poker action and chat with Henry and Zog. This time there's $20 sit-and-go tournament action, some extra input from old poker buddies Stevie and Emma, plus some thoughts on security and more listener tournaments.
item.author: pokerdiagram@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Pokerdiagram.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Tune in, ante up, and fold out with the PokerDiagram boys

item.title: PD025 - Magnum Force
item.description: Resuming normal service after the spectacular success of the third PokerDiagram listener tournament, Henry and Zog get back to the usual business of attempting to take money from complete strangers at a virtual poker table... more online poker action and chat with the boys from London. (Re-posted RSS feed due to bad link in original - sorry all!)

item.itunes:author: Pokerdiagram.com

item.title: PD024 - The Third Listener Tournament, Part 2
item.description: More online poker action and chat from Henry and Zog, but it's something special this time: the final episode of the epic saga of The Third PokerDiagram Listener Tournament. We rejoin at the height of the fighting... Will Zog's AKs hold up against those pocket sevens? Can he make it to the final table? And will Henry eat all the pretzels?
item.author: pokerdiagram@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Pokerdiagram.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Time to find out who makes it to the final table...

item.title: PD023 - The Third Listener Tournament!
item.description: It's the biggest thing since the last big thing at PokerDiagram - out third Listener Tournament! Thanks to PokerRoom's new Private Tournaments almost 50 PokerDiagram listeners join Henry and Zog for our first multi-table invitation-only event. Will Zog make it to the final table? Can Henry keep calm enough to deliver his usual incisive commentary? And just what is everybody drinking?
item.author: pokerdiagram@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Pokerdiagram.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The greatest story ever told (on PokerDiagram, that is...)

item.title: PD020 - The 2nd Listener Tournament
item.description: More online poker action and chat, as PokerDiagram listeners once again pick up the gauntlet thrown down by Henry and Zog and get involved in the second PokerDiagram Listener tournament. This week Zog is looking to improve on his third place in the first listener challenge - but there are ten other contenders scrapping for the money. Two-and-a-half-hours of hotly-contested online poker action, condensed into a mere 73 minutes of poker podcast perfection!
